36.1.hd_quote: The energy and determination to persevere in the face of opposition.
36.1.behavioral_axis: Meets crisis head-on and stays in the wave until it shifts.
36.1.shadow_axis: Rigid resistance that creates more drama than needed.

36.2.hd_quote: Assistance to others in times of decline.
36.2.behavioral_axis: Uses feeling-awareness to help others ride their wave.
36.2.shadow_axis: Selective help; rescues only when convenient.

36.3.hd_quote: The point at which decline has exhausted its power.
36.3.behavioral_axis: Rebuilds a new order after the crisis wave breaks.
36.3.shadow_axis: Carries over old patterns into the new cycle.

36.4.hd_quote: The ability to prepare for and anticipate decline through the accumulation of secret or privileged information.
36.4.behavioral_axis: Uses insight and intel to soften or divert crisis.
36.4.shadow_axis: Information hoarding; double-agent vibes under stress.

36.5.behavioral_axis: Can generate or survive crisis without losing center.

36.6.behavioral_axis: Knows real crisis purifies what’s correct.
36.6.shadow_axis: Cynicism from seeing endless cycles of crisis.
